title: Create Weekly Mine Schedule
description: A short-term planning engineer creates a detailed schedule for the upcoming week, specifying which blocks will be mined each day to meet the plant's feed grade target.

tasks.description: Import the latest grade control model, which has the most up-to-date block grades.
tasks.expected_outcome: The current grade control model is loaded into the scheduling software.

tasks.description: Define the production targets for the week, including total tons and average copper grade to be delivered to the crusher.
tasks.expected_outcome: The weekly production goals are set.

tasks.description: Generate a schedule that sequences the mining of specific blocks to blend high- and low-grade ore, meeting the weekly targets.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed block-by-block schedule for the week is created and published for operations.
